attributes.additional_details:
MPs should only be given portfolios on merits and knowledge of subject and history
Many May think of deal with India but reconsider deal with Europe first
attributes.background: During our mourning period he was nowhere to be seen, he had ad agency advert planned well before he resigned and now clandestine meetings for him to be in POWER, power for power sake and thus content of character is in question !!!

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign.
